ygData.subject: Re: anyone on Sol ro server
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, talk to you then. John Zwanenburg Tips Support/Support Sipt Tel: (613) 998-2745
ygData.messageBody:
Cool,

talk to you then.
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> ----------
> From: Kyle Mobley[SMTP:kyle@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 6:22 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] anyone on Sol ro server
>
> From: Kyle Mobley <kyle@...>
>
> YA im on the west coast ill be on around 9:00 thats about 12:00 your
> time ill look for ya...
>
> Later
>
> Nelix
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Zwanenburg, John [SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 11:12 AM
> > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] anyone on Sol ro server
> >
> > From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> >
> > Cool,
> >
> > My cleric needs to get some levels and he is level 12 so we can easily
> > group
> > up. Ill be online later tonight prob around 11 pm eastern if you wanna
> > meet,
> > i usually hunt in befallen with him. So ill look for you , think youll
> > be
> > around at that time?
> > John Zwanenburg
> > Tips Support/Support Sipt
> > Tel: (613) 998-2745
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Kyle Mobley[SMTP:kyle@...]
> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 6:13 AM
> > > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] anyone on Sol ro server
> > >
> > > From: Kyle Mobley <kyle@...>
> > >
> > > Im am on Solusek Ro although I am a lowly lvl 11
> > >
> > > Always willing to team up for killing let me know...
> > >
> > >
> > > Nelix Solusek Ro (Presently located in Befallen )
> > >
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: Zwanenburg, John [SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> > > > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 10:34 AM
> > > > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > > > Subject: [warriors_eq] anyone on Sol ro server
> > > >
> > > > From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> > > >
> > > > Heya anyone one the Solusek Ro server at all? If so wanna group up
> > > > with a
> > > > level 29 warrior? If noone is that high i also have a level 12
> > cleric
> > > > on the
> > > > server...lemme know im always looking for groups to join. Oh and I
> > > > just got
> > > > the most amazing sheild for my cleric....it was really really hard
> > to
> > > > get
> > > > tho.
> > > >
> > > > The sheild is the chitin shell sheild and can be found in the
> > dungeon
> > > > of
> > > > Guk. You have to kill a Giant Heart spider to get it which is a
> > rare
> > > > spawn.
> > > > Every 4 spawns or so a giant will spawn so its not that long of a
> > > > wait, only
> > > > probelm is he is around levl 20. I was in a group of 5 level 15's
> > and
> > > > myself
> > > > and we took it on succesfully 4 times. The stats on the sheild are
> > 15
> > > > AC ,
> > > > 10 resist to poison and it only weighs 4 pounds!!! if you are
> > around
> > > > level
> > > > 20 or so i reccomend going to get it it can be sold for a great
> > price
> > > > ! plus
> > > > the smaller heart spiders all give great loot! Anyhow, anyone on
> > Sol
> > > > Ro who
> > > > wants to group up from time to time lemme know.
> > > >
> > > > My warrior is Lothaniel T'Kazz and my cleric is Rayne T'kazz.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > John Zwanenburg
> > > > Tips Support/Support Sipt
> > > > Tel: (613) 998-2745
> > > >
> > > > > ----------
> > > > > From: Kyle Mobley[SMTP:kyle@...]
> > > > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 5:31 AM
> > > > > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > > > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] A question on kill stealing.
> > > > >
> > > > > From: Kyle Mobley <kyle@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > This seems like a common thing latley... I too have been heckeld
> > > > about
> > > > > taking others loot when I did all the killing.. Sometimes people
> > run
> > > > and
> > > > > zone and because they started the battle think they should get
> > the
> > > > > rewards... But after you do all the work and kill it, do the
> > most
> > > > > damage yes you should get the rewards not the coward that fled
> > and
> > > > has
> > > > > nothing better to do than complain about looseing a few
> > silver.....
> > > > >
> > > > > Sounds like a wimp with nothing better to do...
> > > > >
> > > > > Nelix....Solsek Ro
> > > > >
> > > > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > > > From: mark mark [SMTP:markerob@...]
> > > > > > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 10:06 AM
> > > > > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] A question on kill stealing.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > From: "mark mark" <markerob@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > He sounds like an asshole,, there is more than enough there
> > for
> > > > > > everyone.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Arathorne,,, Solsek Ro
> > > > > >
> > > > > > >From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
> > > > > > >Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > > > >To: Warrior2 List <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> > > > > > >Subject: [warriors_eq] A question on kill stealing.
> > > > > > >Date: Mon, 17 May 1999 09:48:39 -0400
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >Hi all,
> > > > > > >I've been a roleplayer and a mudder for years now. I've come
> > to
> > > > EQ
> > > > > > like
> > > > > > >most of us, with a lot of experience in multiplayer gaming.
> > Now,
> > > > I'm
> > > > > > >fairly new to EQ (level 8) but I thought I had a good
> > > > understanding
> > > > > > of
> > > > > > >it, and it's unwritten rules, until now.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >The other night I was in BlackBurrow in a small group of 3.
> > Two
> > > > of us
> > > > > > >were at the bottom level, and I was up top, returning from a
> > town
> > > > > > run. I
> > > > > > >saw a gnoll guardsman kill someone, so I ran up to take
> > charge of
> > > > it.
> > > > > > >There was nobody else around it. After a few hits it fled to
> > the
> > > > > > lower
> > > > > > >level with me chasing it every step, hacking and kicking.
> > Upon
> > > > > > reaching
> > > > > > >the lower level, there was a mini train already down there,
> > but
> > > > both
> > > > > > me,
> > > > > > >and the members of my group, were working on the gnoll
> > guardsman
> > > > I
> > > > > > had
> > > > > > >chased down. Towards the end of the fight, a fighter type of
> > some
> > > > > > sort
> > > > > > >walked up and took the final swing on the guardsman. Thinking
> > I
> > > > had
> > > > > > done
> > > > > > >it ( I had to scroll back to look afterward) I bent over and
> > > > looted
> > > > > > the
> > > > > > >corpse.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >The fighter started complaining at once that I was a kill
> > stealer
> > > > and
> > > > > > I
> > > > > > >took his loot. I explained to him that I had chased the
> > monster
> > > > down,
> > > > > > >and had done the most damage, and therefore the computer LET
> > me
> > > > take
> > > > > > my
> > > > > > >kill. He respnded that HE had chased the monster down from
> > the
> > > > top (I
> > > > > > >never even saw anyone up top but myself) and had made the
> > kill
> > > > > > therefore
> > > > > > >it wasn't mine to take. I didn't feel like the argument was
> > worth
> > > > it
> > > > > > so
> > > > > > >I gave up and tried to trade him the loot. He would not
> > accept,
> > > > but
> > > > > > >instead complained to me via tells that he couldn't believe I
> > did
> > > > > > that.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >My questions are:
> > > > > > >1.) Was I ethically wrong to take the loot?
> > > > > > >2.) Does the game only allow the majority damage dealer to
> > take
> > > > the
> > > > > > >loot, or the final swinger?
> > > > > > >3.) How would you guys deal with this situation?
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >Thanks for any advice ....
> > > > > > >-Faderic of Qeynos (Ellorisi Marr server)
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > >
